content.query:
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.users_alfa(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate nvarchar(50),
    DownVotes nvarchar(10),
    LastAccessDate nvarchar(50),
    Reputation nvarchar (50),
    UpVotes nvarchar (50),
    Views nvarchar (50),
    Email nvarchar (50),
)

 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/sharedknow/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.users_alfa;
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT party_id,hash_unique,process_date, email,creation_date,
reputation_count, upvotes_count, downvotes_count, views_count, record_source, 
flag_active,load_date,creation_user
FROM master_party.m_party

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_alfa 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_alfa/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 

SELECT Id,CreationDate FROM master_party.dim_users_deltaa;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_users;

SELECT TOP (10) Id,CreationDate FROM master_party.dim_users_102;

---------------------------------------------------------
## comments

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/comments/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

---
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.comments_prueba4(
    Id nvarchar(50),
    CreationDate nvarchar(50), 
    PostId nvarchar(50),
    Score nvarchar(50),
    UserId nvarchar(50),
)

 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/sharedknow/comments/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

SELECT * FROM master_party.comments_prueba4;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_alfa 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_alfa/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS

## Badges

---

 WITH (

GO
---------------------------------------
## postlinks

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/postlinks/*.parquet',

---

---------------------------------------
## posts

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/posts/2008-01-01/*.parquet',

FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]

)

 WITH (

     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,

GO

SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.posts_fecha;

---------------------------------------
## posttypes

SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/sharedknow/posttypes/*.parquet',

 WITH (

GO
---------------------------------------







WITH ShortCreationTable(shortdate) AS (
SELECT CONVERT(DATE, SUBSTRING(creation_date, 1,10)) AS shortdate
FROM master_transaction.t_interaction
), DistinctDateTable (distinctdate) AS (
SELECT DISTINCT shortdate as distinctdate
FROM ShortCreationTable
)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distinctdate ASC) AS period_id, 
distinctdate as period,
YEAR(distinctdate) as year,
MONTH(distinctdate) as month
FROM DistinctDateTable;
